LANDING.TITLE: Plans for every level of ambition

HOME.TITLE: PROCYCLA AND MODSIM
HOME.DESCRIPTION_TITLE: Welcome to the Modeling and Simulation Platform provided by ProCycla.
HOME.DESCRIPTION: This platform is oriented to support decision making for the design and operation of biogas plants. We invite you to use the modeling tool you have access to, find relevant information about modeling and exchange ideas with our modeling team.

COMPANY.TITLE: Company
COMPANY.ABOUT_US_TEXT: Procycla is a company founded in 2012 with offices in Spain and Chile, which offers engineering and consulting products and services in different areas of environmental management, renewable energies, waste treatment and urban planning.
COMPANY.ABOUT_MODSIM_TEXT: ModSim is the department of Modeling and Simulation of ProCycla. ModSim aims at tackling the challenges that the process industry faces through mathematical modeling and simulation for virtual prototyping/piloting.
COMPANY.ABOUT_MODSIM_TEXT2: ModSim provides top-of-the-line computational tools to create virtual digital twins of specific systems. Our service is designed to optimize energy and biological processes, such as anaerobic digestion plants and biogas generation, leading to more efficient and cost-effective operations for your business.
COMPANY.ANDRES_FEATURE_2: Ph.D. in Engineering Sciences from PUCV (Chile).
COMPANY.MARIA_FEATURE_2: Ph.D. in Chemical Engineering from the University of Alberta (Canada).

SOFTWARE.TITLE: Software
SOFTWARE.BMP_MODULE_TEXT: The BMP module is a modeling tool where data from conventional anaerobic batch test or biomethane potential test can be processed by...
SOFTWARE.CSTR_MODULE_TEXT: The CSTR module allows the user to simulate the opration of a continuous anaerobic digester to predict the biogas production and the digestate...
SOFTWARE.BPA_MT_MODULE_TEXT: The BPA-MT module takes your BMP data and provides a dynamic prediction of the performance of an industrial digester including the uncertainty of the results.

LOGIN.TITLE: Welcome back
LOGIN.TWO_FA: New device detected. We sent you a code to your email address. Please enter it below.

SETTINGS.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: Recieve a code to your email address when signing in.

ACCOUNT_BILLING.NO_CREDIT_CARD: You need to put your credit card first

EDIT.DELETE_SIMULATION_DIALOG: Are you sure you want to delete this simulation? This action cannot be undone.
EDIT.DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.

NEW_SIMULATION.TITLE: New Simulation

STEP_0.TITLE: Add Information
STEP_0.DESCRIPTION: Provide a meaningful name and a brief description for the simulation that will be run related to the current project. Define the stage of the biogas project you are working in the type cell: Feasibility or Plant in operation. If you choose Feasibility, the BPA-MT module will only execute the BMP step to get an estimation of the energy potential can be obtained.  If you choose Plant in Operation, you will also have to provide information about the digester and substrate properties. In this case, the BPA-MT module will execute the BMP step followed by the CSTR step to get the dynamic performance of the digester operation.

STEP_1.TITLE: Add File
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: Choose the file to be uploaded. This file can pertain to one of the following formats (1) the AMPTS format (Report from the equipment provided by BPC) and (2) ProCycla’s format. More info This file will enter the cleaning and wrangling process in the platform. The results of this process are shown in the next step.

STEP_2.TITLE: Validate File
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: The identified cluster of triplicates for each experiment are shown in the boxes below. Each type of test, blank, control, substrate 1, etc., are grouped in clusters. Please check carefully if we have identified each cluster correctly. Special attention should be paid to define the blanks (as cluster) corresponding to each substrate cluster. The user can manually organize the experiments in each cluster when mistakes have been made.

STEP_FINAL.TITLE: Resume
STEP_FINAL.DESCRIPTION: The data of the triplicate test has been averaged and the blank results have been subtracted from substrates test values. The cleaned and processed results are shown graphically here. A table with the results is also provided. If the data is not right go back to previous steps and check that each step was done correctly.

NEW_SIMULATION.RESULT_STEP_ONE: First step - Data Loading and Cleaning

PROJECTS.MY_PROJECTS_DESCRIPTION: The projects that are currently active are shown next:
PROJECTS.NEW_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Create a new project by providing a name and a short description. Suggested names can by 'Biogas plant 1', 'Livestock substrates', 'July 2022', etc

SIMULATION.DESCRIPTION: The results description is broken down in four sections: Cleaning/Wrangling, BMP step, CSTR Step and Energy assessment. The state of the execution of each step is provided next to the header. The CSTR step may take a bit longer depending on the established simulation conditions. Moreover, a summarized report of the results can be downloaded.

ERRORS.PARAM_SC_1: Param value '{{name}}' must be between {{min}} and {{max}}.
ERRORS.PARAM_SC_2: Param ci_inf '{{name}}' must be greater than {{min}}.
ERRORS.PARAM_SC_3: Param value '{{name}}' must satisfy the equation {{equation}}.
ERRORS.METRIC_GT_ERROR: Metric value '{{name}}' must be greater than {{value}}.
ERRORS.METRIC_LT_ERROR: Metric value '{{name}}' must be less than {{value}}.

USER_MANAGEMENT_ID.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: User will recieve a code to his email address when signing in.

API.NETWORK_ERROR: Network Error. Please try again later
